overview: Forever Faithless – The Greatest Hits is a greatest hits compilation album from the dance music group Faithless. It features all their released singles- except for "Take The Long Way Home"-, plus three additional new tracks ("Fatty Boo", "Reasons (Saturday Night)", and "Why Go?" (2005 remix featuring Estelle). Forever Faithless was the best selling dance album of 2005.
title: Forever Faithless – The Greatest Hits
